ThingDef.Name: VWEL_LaserSword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona laser sword
ThingDef.description: An ultratech device consisting of a handle and an extendable laser blade. A weapon of gentlemen.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Gun_LaserPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona laser pistol
ThingDef.description:
An ultratech pistol capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Gun_LaserSMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona laser SMG
ThingDef.description:
An ultratech submachine gun capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: laser shot
ThingDef.description: A focused laser beam.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Gun_LaserRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona laser rifle
ThingDef.description:
An ultratech rifle capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage over medium distance.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: laser scatter shot
ThingDef.description: A broken down laser beam.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Gun_LaserShotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona laser shotgun
ThingDef.description:
An ultratech scatter gun capable of emitting several beams of light with enough power to deal considerable damage.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: precise laser shot
ThingDef.description: A focused, long range laser beam.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Gun_LaserSniperRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona laser sniper rifle
ThingDef.description:
An ultratech sniper rifle capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage over long range.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Bullet_LaserMinigun_Bond
ThingDef.label: laser minigun shot
ThingDef.description: A narrow, focused laser beam from a multibarrel weapon.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Gun_LaserMinigun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona laser minigun
ThingDef.description:
An ultratech multi-barrel device capable of emitting a concentrated beam of light with enough power to deal considerable damage with a long, continuous firing mode.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Bullet_TeslaGun_Bond
ThingDef.label: tesla shot
ThingDef.description: A lightning bolt emitted by a Tesla device.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Gun_TeslaGun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona tesla gun
ThingDef.description:
An ultratech arc lightning device capable of emitting a lightning bolt that disable electronic systems and sets enemies on fire.

By using advanced battery cells, this weapon is capable of warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

Used widely by ultratech marines during mechanoid wars.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: VWEL_Gun_SalvagedLaserPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona salvaged laser pistol
ThingDef.description:
A salvaged pistol capable of emitting an unstable beam of light with enough power to deal moderate damage.

By using makeshift battery cells, this weapon is capable of quickly warming up, boosting the firing speed with each consecutive shot when standing still.

This weapon can overheat quickly when fully warmed up, resulting in a small battery explosion around the user.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
